doc.field: -45 Minutes, Spent With Friends, review of Wendy Perron and Susan Rethorst, by Robert J. Pierce, Jan. 19th, 1978 -Within You/Without You, review of Robert Ashley, by Sally Banes, January 19th, 1978 -Historical Immaterialism, review of Ann Wilson's Butler's Lives of the Saints, by Sally Banes, January 26th, 1978 -Two-Track Mind, review of Amy Taubin, by Wendy Perron, January 26th, 1978 -Failure: An Exhibition, review of Bill Lundberg, by Jane Dubose Jones, February 2nd, 1978 -Gallery Humor, review of Michael Smith, by Noel Carroll, February 2nd, 1978 -Austerity and Oppression, review of Worksong, by Wendy Perron, February 23rd, 1978 -Poet in the Bathroom, review of Barbara Kruger, by Louise Steinman, February 23rd, 1978 -Dummy Duality, review of Charles Ludlam's The Ventriloquist's Wife, by Eileen Blumenthal, Feb. 23rd, 1978 -Engineering Images, review of Sylvia Whitman, by Sally Banes, March 16th, 1978 -Spring Mumbo-Jumbo, review of Anna Halprin, by Sally Banes, March 23rd, 1978 -Humor, Blood, and Guts, review of Lanny Harrison, by Wendy Perron, March 30th, 1978 -Lovely Lifelessness, review of Love of Life Orchestra, by Wendy Perron, April 20th, 1978 -Adored, review of The Children of Theatre Street, by Wendy Perron, May 1st, 1978 (incomplete article) -On the Rocks, review of Pooh Kaye, by Wendy Perron, May 4th, 1978 -The End of the Trail, Review of Echo Ranch, by Noel Carroll, May 11th, 1978 -Flu as Fashion and Art as Business, review of Richard Foreman's Fashion Show, by Sally Banes, May 18th, 1978 -A Promising Journeyman, review of Hard Pore Corn, by Noel Carroll, May 18th, 1978 -Dancing Working, review of Miner's Lamp Dance Group, by Wendy Perron, May 25th, 1978 -Sweet, review of Short and Suite, by Sally R. Sommer and Erica Sommer, June 1st, 1978 -Celebrating Survival, review by Sally Banes, June 15th, 1978 -P.S. Afterthoughts, review of Patti Smith, by Wendy Perron, June 15th, 1978 -N Structures, No Cages, review of Simone Forti and Peter Van Riper, by Wendy Perron, August 31st, 1978 -Tout Sweet, review of Andy deGroat and Dancers, by Sally Banes, August 31st, 1978 -Paxton Untitled, review of Steve Paxton, by Yvonne Rainer, November 16th, 1978
